column5: We just finished an HGTV-style gut reno and now our private 3 bedroom guest house is all yours! It is close to the Convention Centers, Dallas tourist sites, entertainment venues in Deep Ellum, lively bars, restaurants, fitness studios, and shops on Lower Greenville and Uptown's McKinney Avenue. Located in a historic residential neighborhood, both Dallas airports are a short drive away. Arlington, Ft. Worth, Frisco, and Plano are also easily accessible. I can't wait to be your host in the Big D!
column8: 3 BR HGTV-Style Guest House Near Downtown Dallas!
